msg.msgText: A call to getChar() on a MapMessage or to readChar() on a StreamMessage failed because the map element {0} contains a null object or the stream object is null.

msgExplanation.p: The getChar() MapMessage method can read only Character elements that contain a non-null object. The readChar() StreamMessage method can read only non-null Character objects.

msgUserResponse.p: Ensure that map Character elements contain a non-null object before calling getChar(), and that stream elements are not null when calling readChar().
